## MultimediaLinkFieldDefinition type

Represents a Multimedia link field definition (in a Schema).

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type MultimediaLinkFieldDefinition = ItemPublishableFieldDefinition & {
    AllowedTargetSchemas?: Array<Link>;
    DefaultValue?: Link;
};
```
